title: The Search for the golden boomerang
creator_contributor_role: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Radio programs - Australia - History
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Sociology, Urban
description: Dramatisations of episodes from the long-running children's radio serial of the 1940s, performed with kitschy aplomb, are juxtaposed with scenes of everyday life in early postwar urban Australia in such a way as to underline the racism and sexism of the time. Cast includes Jojn Flaus, Alistair Forge, Sue World, Don Munro, Jim Howard, Christine Kerner, Peter Lane.
